hero.subtitle: Artisan cheeses for true gourmets. French traditions, handmade quality, and the aesthetics of taste. Created for pure pleasure.
hero.subtitle2: When you make a little, you can make it true. Without haste or simplification â€” with respect for the product and for the customer.

welcome.title: My name is Irina Pliner. I make cheese near Tbilisi, at an altitude of 1100 meters â€” in clean air, silence, and peace.
welcome.line1: All cheeses are handmade using classic French and Italian techniques, with mandatory pasteurization. My cheese doesnâ€™t smell like a factory â€” every piece passes through my own clean, caring hands.
welcome.line2: My cheese has character, depth, and soul. Itâ€™s not universal â€” itâ€™s alive, honest, complex, and beautiful. The kind of cheese you want to return to because it holds something special and genuine.

guarantees.title: Captain Cheese Ethics
guarantees.intro: The honesty of taste begins with the honesty of process. Every step â€” from milk to packaging â€” is under my personal attention and responsibility. I make cheese the way I would want it to be made for me.
guarantees.point1: I use only high-quality farm milk from a single trusted supplier. Everything thatâ€™s in the milk is revealed in the cheese â€” tenfold. Thatâ€™s why milk is the foundation of purity, freshness, and flavor.
guarantees.point2: All cheeses are made exclusively from pasteurized milk. This is my principle â€” safety and consistent quality matter more than the easy way.
guarantees.point3: Only European cultures and enzymes â€” French, Italian, and time-tested.
guarantees.point4: Cheeses mature in a specially equipped room â€” separate, clean, and designed specifically for cheesemaking. Refrigerators are professional and dedicated solely to cheese.
guarantees.point5: I trust intuition but verify with numbers. pH meters, thermometers, and timers are my allies in a craft where precision matters.
guarantees.point6: Each piece is wrapped by hand, carefully and respectfully. I use special micro-perforated paper made in France, which allows the cheese to breathe and stay fresh longer.
guarantees.point7: The cheese travels to you as I would deliver a gift to a friend â€” gently, with temperature and time control. A thermal box with cooling ensures its quality.
